text: U bi sond! Me di nava hemu koman da pexember sandine, ji bo ku ewan (pexemberan ji koma xwe ra aha bejin): “Hun ji Yezdan ra peresti bikin u hun xwe ji perestiya pelid biparisinin.” Idi ji we koma (pexember) hinek hene; Yezdan ewan anine reya rast u hinek ji ji wan koman hene: rewundabun li ser wan maf buye. Idi hun meze bikin! ka encama wane virek ca buye
